mapper.select: select o.amount, o.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, photos.photo_id, photos.photo_oname, photos.photo_sname, photos.photo_type, photos.photo_role from order_products o, products p, photos where o.order_id = #{order_id} and o.p_id = p.p_id and p.p_id = photos.p_id and photos.photo_role = 'main'
